description:
A fast and handy app to check and manage your Hotmail, Windows Live, and Outlook inbox with customizable push notifications.

* MULTIPLE HOTMAIL ACCOUNTS:
Add multiple Hotmail accounts to MailBuzzr, you can easily switch between one account to another account easily with just a single click. Or you can read all messages in a unified inbox.

* PERSONALIZED MESSAGE FILTERING:
Filter your messages by sender, recipients, subject, or message. Assign label, set custom sound, color, and importancy level to it. And with its unique labeling feature you can easily distinguish your important messages from the list.

* PUSH NOTIFICATION WITH 5 IMPORTANCE LEVELS:
Set importance level to your messages, the lowest level will give you only subtle vibrate when the message arrive. while the highest level will keep alerting you until the message is read. You will definitely not miss important emails any more!

* SLEEK, FAST, AND EASY-TO-USE INTERFACE:
We carefully designed every element of MailBuzzr to give you the best user interface imaginable. Everything is accessible in one main screen yet we still maintain its cleanliness and usability. You will definitely love it once you use it!

* QUIET TIME (do not disturb mode):
We know you do not want to get disturbed during specific time. You just need to set a quiet time period and MailBuzzr will not notify you during that time.

* MOBILE OPTIMIZED ATTACHMENT PREVIEW:
Preview Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF documents, and other popular file formats directly from the app.  And they are all optimized for mobile viewing.

** Check out some features you get in MailBuzzr for Hotmail:
- Handle multiple Hotmail accounts
- Personalized push notifications
- Push notifications with 5 importancy level
- Advanced message filtering
- Assign labels to messages
- Customize message notification sound with 30+ ringtones
- Preview Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF documents, and other popular file formats 
- Sleek, beautiful, and easy to use user interface
- Support quiet time
- Search messages by keyword
- Color coded accounts and labels for easy reading.

** Get a new experience of Hotmail by downloading MailBuzzr for Hotmail now. It’s free! **

** Please note: this is not the official app for Hotmail. MailBuzzr for Hotmail is an independent app and is not affiliated with, nor has it been authorized, sponsored, or otherwise approved by Microsoft Corporation. Also, this app is not trying to infringe on copyrights. All trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners.

If you have questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@aversys.com
releaseNotes:
- Add Touch ID support in Pass Code lock
- Fixed push notification issue in iOS 8
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
